content: May 6 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play on the first day of match 49 between Chennai Super Kings and Mumbai Indians on Saturday at Chennai, India Chennai Super Kings win by 6 wickets Mumbai Indians 1st innings Cameron Green b Tushar Deshpande 6 Ishan Kishan c Maheesh Theekshana b Deepak Chahar 7 Rohit Sharma c Ravindra Jadeja b Deepak Chahar 0 Nehal Wadhera b Matheesha Pathirana 64 Suryakumar Yadav b Ravindra Jadeja 26 Tristan Stubbs c Ravindra Jadeja b Matheesha Pathirana 20 Tim David c Ruturaj Gaikwad b Tushar Deshpande 2 Arshad Khan c Ruturaj Gaikwad b Matheesha Pathirana 1 Jofra Archer Not Out 3 Piyush Chawla Not Out 2 Extras 0b 5lb 0nb 0pen 3w 8 Total (20.0 overs) 139-8 Fall of Wickets : 1-13 Green, 2-13 Kishan, 3-14 Sharma, 4-69 Yadav, 5-123 Wadhera, 6-127 David, 7-134 Khan, 8-137 Stubbs Did Not Bat : Madhwal Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Deepak Chahar 3 0 18 2 6.00 Tushar Deshpande 4 0 26 2 6.50 1w Ravindra Jadeja 4 0 37 1 9.25 1w Moeen Ali 1 0 10 0 10.00 Maheesh Theekshana 4 0 28 0 7.00 Matheesha Pathirana 4 0 15 3 3.75 .......................................................
